couponTitle: CouponFollow Exclusive | Get $10 Off at SeatGeek
couponDescription: Get $10 off on eligible purchases at SeatGeek when you spend $250 or more and apply this CouponFollow exclusive code at checkout.

couponTitle: SeatGeek Promo Code: Get $5 Off Your Purchase
couponDescription: Save $5 on all orders of $300 or more when you apply this SeatGeek promo code at checkout.

couponTitle: SeatGeek Promo Code: Get $10 Off Orders $250+
couponDescription: Redeem this promo code at checkout and save $10 on orders over $250.

couponTitle: SeatGeek Coupon: $10 Off Your Purchase of $250+
couponDescription: Use this promo code to get $10 off your event with SeatGeek. Just spend $250 or more on an event to qualify for this deal.

couponTitle: SeatGeek Promo Code: Get 15% Off Your Purchase
couponDescription: Get 15% off your first purchase at SeatGeek.com. The discount is capped at $25 and valid only on eligible purchases.

couponTitle: Save 20% Off Sporting Events With Discount Code
couponDescription: For a limited time, save up to 20% off select sporting events with this hand-tested discount code

couponDescription: Redeem this promo code at checkout and save up to 20% on any item.
